chunk:
Wildling Lumin Three-in-One Oil

Brand: Wildling

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Passiflora Edulis (Passion Fruit) Seed Oil**, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil*, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Seed and Fruit Oil*, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower*, Tocopherol

Directions: This vegan and cruelty-free multi-tasking facial oil is formulated with a high concentration of Vitamins A, C, and E as well as linoleic and omega fatty acids to clarify, calm, and balance skin’s oil production
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
